ModMetaData.name: Kill For Me
ModMetaData.author: aRandomKiwi
ModMetaData.description:
Teach your animals to kill enemies in packs Make your own animal army, up to 10 "regiments" with their own leader and warriors ! Fully customizable ! One RimThemes theme included !
Please watch the tutorial video and read the "tips" section (important) to use the mod correctly.
Version <color=#FFD800>1.6.0</color>
